relatedBlades.title: Enhance your Microsoft 365 security With Cloudflare Zero Trust
relatedBlades.copy:
Microsoft 365, a go-to productivity suite for many businesses, delivers essential native security defenses to help teams collaborate and communicate safely. 

Built-in security for SaaS apps has improved to block many of the more common threats targeting organizations. However, bad actors are simultaneously evolving to become more evasive. Today's attacks are increasingly more targeted and sophisticated with the ability to bypass native app security functionality. 

Explore this content hub to learn how to enhance Microsoft security with Cloudflare Zero Trust:

- Simplifying the way we protect SaaS apps Whitepaper 
- How to stop Business Email Compromise threats Whitepaper
- Area 1 + Microsoft 365 Email Security Solution Brief
- How to replace your email gateway with Cloudflare Area 1 Blog
- Gartner Market Guide for Email Security 2021 Analyst Report
